name: Island Tour By Jeep
description: Your tour starts when you join a polaris caravan at your hotel. The first stop on your adventure will be a visit to the ruins of the ancient Mayans that inhabited the island where your will be informed about their culture and traditions. Continue your adventure while you go visit a real Mexican Tequilera where you will have the opportunity to learn about the production and history of Mexican tequila as well as try some of the best tequilas Mexico has to offer. We will then continue our drive through untouched virgin beaches and jungle before arriving at one of Cozumel's national parks and environmental reserves. Here we will visit crocodiles in their native habitat before visiting a light house that will provide you with a breathtaking view of the island. Having seen the beauty of Cozumel on land you will arrive at a private beach where you will have the chance to snorkel and experience first hand the beauty of underwater marine wildlife. A buffet of Mexican cuisine will allow you to recharge your energies and relax for a moment before being dropped off at your respective hotels.
